title: The Holidays Full Album - (Packard Bell Multimedia Pack HOLIDAYS
description:
The Holidays - Full album "Everyday is a Holiday" and full music video for the song "Everyday is a Holiday"

In the 1990's, when multimedia home-computer technology was in its infancy, Microsoft and Packard Bell developed a Microsoft Multimedia Pack. The pack contained digital sound and video files for demonstrating how multimedia computers worked. In it, it has a snippet called HOLIDAYS.AVI, which is a clip from a music video for the song "Octopus Of Love" sung by a band named The Holidays. Because the Multimedia Pack was such a common product at that time, many people wonder where the full song, video, and album is. The answer is, right here in this torrent!

This torrent contains:

The full album "Everyday is a Holiday" from the Holidays.

The full music video "Octopus of Love"

The short clip copied from the Multimedia pack CD-ROM

Album art and Chuckie-Boy Records (The label) information


Relive the moments with your first computer in this torrent! All files play on modern computers.
